com.shopwiki.roger.rpc
Interface RequestHandler<I,O>

Type Parameters:
I - request type (I for input).
O - response type (O for output).
public interface RequestHandler<I,O>

This interface is left for the user to implement. Instances of this are generally passed into a RpcServer.WorkerFactory and used to create RpcWorkers.

Author:
rstewart

Method Detail

getRequestType

org.codehaus.jackson.type.TypeReference<I> getRequestType()
Returns:
A TypeReference used by Jackson to know what class to instantiate when deserializing requests.

handleRequest

O handleRequest(I request)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
request - Deserialized from JSON.
Returns:
response Serialized to JSON.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Some types of Exceptions produce a special ResponseStatus. IllegalArgumentException -> INVALID_REQUEST NackException -> NACK
